name: Immortals Fenyx Rising
overview: Immortals Fenyx Rising brings grand mythological adventure to life. Play as Fenyx, a new, winged demigod, on a quest to save the Greek gods. The fate of the world is at stake – you are the gods’ last hope. - Wield the powers of the gods like Achilles' sword and Daidalos' wings to battle powerful enemies and solve ancient puzzles. - Fight iconic mythological beasts like Cyclops and Medusa in dynamic combat in the air and on the ground. - Use your skills and diverse weapons, including self-guided arrows, telekinesis, and more, for devastating damage. - Discover a stylized open world across seven unique regions, each inspired by the gods.
